doc.title: While the Music Lasts
doc.plot: This 'backstage' documentary tells the story of the Batignano Opera Festival, founded thirty years ago by the visionary English designer, Adam Polock. Part opera boot camp, part holiday, the festival has launched the careers of almost everyone working in British opera today - including Lesley Garrett, Tim Albery, Richard Jones, Richard Hudson, Graham Vick and Jane Glover.
